org.activebpel.rt.util
Class AeCompareXML

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.util.AeCompareXML
public class AeCompareXML
extends java.lang.Object

Compare two xml elements for match (use setting of MatchOrder to force order checking).

          list of errors
private  boolean mMatchOrder
          flag for matching exact order of elements

Method Detail

compareBothDocuments

public boolean compareBothDocuments(java.lang.String aStr1,
                                    java.lang.String aStr2)
A main entry point for compare it first parses the passed documents and then calls compareBothElements. If either parse fails false is returned.

Returns:
boolean true if documents match

compareBothElements

public boolean compareBothElements(org.w3c.dom.Element aElement1,
                                   org.w3c.dom.Element aElement2,
                                   java.lang.String aPath)
Main entry point for compare it calls compareElement for 1 and 2 and then 2 and 1 to make sure that neither has extra elements or attributes.

Returns:
boolean true if elements match

elementNamesMatch

protected boolean elementNamesMatch(org.w3c.dom.Element aOne,

Only considers the elements namespaces if at least one of the elements have a namespace, otherwise it just compares the node names.

compareAttributes

private boolean compareAttributes(org.w3c.dom.Element aElement1,
                                  org.w3c.dom.Element aElement2,
                                  java.lang.String aPath)
Checks that all attributes set in element1 are in element2 with the same value. Note that it doesn't check the reverse.

Parameters:
aElement1 -
aElement2 -
aPath -
Returns:
boolean
